meanings.definition: The quality or state of being habitual.
meanings.sent1: Her habitualnesses in daily routines made her very organized.
meanings.sent2: His habitualnesses in arriving early to work impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The habitualnesses of always wearing mismatched socks brought smiles to those around her.
meanings.sent4: The habitualnesses of his laughter filled the room with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The habitualnesses of her kindness left a lasting impact on everyone she met.

meanings.definition: The tendency to do something regularly or repeatedly.
meanings.sent1: The child's habitualnesses of asking 'why' showed his curiosity.
meanings.sent2: His habitualnesses of practicing the piano paid off during the recital.
meanings.sent3: The habitualnesses of always losing his keys became a running joke in the family.
meanings.sent4: Her habitualnesses of painting the sky with colors amazed all who saw.
meanings.sent5: The habitualnesses of his storytelling transported listeners to magical realms.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being ingrained or customary.
meanings.sent1: The habitualnesses of traditional ceremonies were cherished by the community.
meanings.sent2: His habitualnesses of following superstitions stemmed from his upbringing.
meanings.sent3: The habitualnesses of celebrating birthdays with a dance party brought laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her habitualnesses of wearing a lucky charm necklace became her signature style.
meanings.sent5: The habitualnesses of his morning coffee ritual signaled the start of a new day.
